Citizen_01.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up one-liners. Guard from the counting house got absolutely hammered during her lunch break.

Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up one-liners. Distracted and annoyed guard who is trying to deal with his drunk friend.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up AD. Two guards for the counting house talking outside the blushing mermaid. Guard 1 got hammered during her lunch break aand guard 2 is freaking out - knowing that they're going to get in trouble for going to a pub on shift.

Citizen_01_0.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
Citizen_01_0.text: I've got a game for you. You take a drink. Then I take a drink. Then we're both drunk! Haa.
Citizen_01_0.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered out of her tree.

Citizen_01_1.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
Citizen_01_1.text: This uniform's neat, isn't it? But why am I - ohhh, wait - I had a shift at the Counting House. Oops.
Citizen_01_1.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered out of her tree. Oops is said with a laugh

Citizen_02_0.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
Citizen_02_0.text: Suppose I'll have to add 'babysitting drunks' to my employment experience. 'Go work for a bank' they said, 'It'll be prestigious' they said...

Citizen_02_1.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
Citizen_02_1.text: I'm off the clock, dokal - or I would be if it weren't for this blithering idiot. If you've got business at the Counting House, it's just down the road.
Citizen_02_1.context:
NodeContext: dokaal - DO-khal (like a throat clear at the end) - meaning two-legger (aka humanoid) 
'this blithering idiot' refers to the colleague who's had too much to drink

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.text: How much did you drink, you idiot dokal?
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.context:
NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled
dokaal - DO-khal (like a throat clear at the end) - meaning 'two-legger' (aka humanoid)

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.text: Just - just a bitta beer. And wine. And mead.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.text: We have to go back to the Counting House! What were you thinking?!
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.text: Ah, don't be a dry-shite. No one will... will... yeah.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.context: NodeContext: was trying to say 'no-one will notice' but forgot the sentence halfway through.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.text: Could you at least try to stand up straight.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.context: NodeContext: trying not to lose his temper with his drunk friend (and failing)

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.text: I am! Oh - oh, that was a bad idea.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.context: NodeContext: tries to stand up straight and very quickly feels like she's gonna puke (absolutely hammered)

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.text: Don't you dare puke on your uniform.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_10.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_10.text: You - you want a drink? Let's get one for the road.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_10.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered, can't see why her friend is freaking out about her being drunk on shift

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.text: No, you moron. We could be fired for this!
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_9.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_9.text: Ah, sure, a bitta drink never killed anyone.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_9.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered, can't see why her friend is freaking out about her being drunk on shift

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.speaker: Cashguard Gurira
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.text: Tell that to Glitterbeard! He'll have our heads.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.context: NodeContext: talking to his very drunk friend - shocked and appalled
